articles.title: Video shows overcrowded Christmas market in city hit hard by Covid-19
articles.description: A Christmas market in Nottingham, in central England, has "temporarily" closed due to overcrowding just one day after it opened to the public. Nottingham is currently under 'Tier 3' coronavirus restrictions -- the toughest measures in place in England.
